episodes.title: The Grand Tour Presents: Seamen
episodes.plot: The route begins in Cambodia at Siem Reap and then winds downriver to Tonlé Sap lake, before joining the Mekong Delta and sailing into Vietnam. The final port of call is Vung Tau, in south Vietnam.

episodes.title: The Grand Tour Presents: A Massive Hunt
episodes.plot: Hosts Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond, and James May journey through Madagascar in search of buried treasure.

episodes.title: The Grand Tour Presents: Lochdown
episodes.plot: The presenters are celebrating the great 70s American cars they saw in TV shows, as they road trip around Scotland, creating chaos on the streets of Edinburgh and building a homemade floating bridge across the Hebridean sea.

episodes.title: The Grand Tour Presents: Carnage A Trois
episodes.plot: On a road trip, the trio dish up a hair-raising mountain climb, bomb defusals, propeller powered cars, helicopter stunts and the most thrilling race of their lives before reaching the English Channel for a jaw dropping medieval climax.
